description.integration: Boltic Extract, it is an integration tool that lets you extract data from webpages and use AI prompts to capture specific details with ease. Automate the process of pulling targeted information from any site, turning unstructured web content into actionable insights in just a few clicks.

ai_description.integration: Boltic Extract automates pulling targeted information from any website by letting you extract and check the extract_status of web data using AI prompts for effortless capture of specific details.
